    • Method Detail

      • setCotEventListener

        public void setCotEventListener​(CotServiceRemote.CotEventListener cel)
        Sets the CotEventListener for the remote service.
        Parameters:
        cel - the cot event listener to use. If a previous one is set, then it is unregistered

      • fireConnect

        public static void fireConnect()
        Called by ATAKActivity to tell everyone that we are finally connected. This simulates the old way where connections would happen after the service started. This iterates though a queue that contains all of the CotServiceRemote listening on a connection. Any CotServiceRemote objects that are provided after this is been called will just immediately fire back the connected() callback.

      • connect

        public void connect​(CotServiceRemote.ConnectionListener cl)
        Enqueues all any ConnectionListener on the queue prior to fireConnected is called.

        Any CotServiceRemote objects that are provided after the fireConnected call will immediately fire back the connected() callback.

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected()

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        .

      • addInput

        public void addInput​(java.lang.String input,
                     android.os.Bundle meta)
        Request an input be added for the local network.
        Parameters:
        input - this is the ConnectString as shown in CotOutputsListActivity
        meta - contained in TAKServer is all of the values that can be put in the bundle.

      • removeStream

        public final void removeStream​(java.lang.String connectString)
        Request a connection be removed for a TAK server.
        Parameters:
        connectString - the stream defined by its connect string or * wild card "**" to remove all streams.
